subject: The Script
author: Eric VanDuzer
full_text:
here is the script I said I would write.  Now please no hate mail this is
just a satire



WILLY:     WILLY HAYS HERE WONDERING IF YOU HAVE LOST SOMEONE RECENTLY??
WHERE THEY RICH AND YOU WANT TO FIND THERE HIDDEN STASH?  DID THEY HAVE
SOMETHING THEY WANTED TO TELL YOU AND NEVER GOT THE CHANCE OR DID YOU HAVE
SOMETHING YOU WANTED TO TELL THEM??  WELL NOW YOU CAN WITH THE ONE AND ONLY
"FRANKS BOX"!!!!  JUST PLUG IT IN AND AWAY YOU GO!!

BOX USER:     "FRANKS BOX" IS GREAT!!  ALL I DID WAS PLUG IT ON AND LISTENED
TO THE DIAL SWEEP THE RADIO BANDS.  I ASKED IF MY DEAD UNCLE WAS THERE AND
IF HE REALLY DID MOLEST ME AS A CHILD??  AND THE BOX SAID YES I DID!!
FINALLY SOME CLOSURE!!

WILLY:     SKEPTICS BEWARE!!!  THIS IS THE REALLY REAL THING!!! BELIEVERS
BEWARE!!!! THE RESULTS MAY SHOCK YOU!!!!  ARE YOU SPEAKING WITH THE DEAD,
BEINGS FROM AN INTER-DIMENSIONAL REALM, ET'S!! WHO KNOWS, YOU ARE TALKING TO
SOMEONE!!!!

BOX USER:  THE BOX IS AMAZING!!! I ASKED IT IF MY GREAT GREAT COUSINS
BROTHER WAS MURDERED, AND IT SAID YES AND IT EVEN TOLD ME WHERE IN THE WALL
HE WAS BURIED

CHRIS MOON:  I CAN'T SEE WHY I CANT GET THIS DAMN THING TO WORK!!!! I AM
GOING TO GO BACK TO MY BOX WHICH ONLY I CAN UNDERSTAND IF YOU WANNA WATCH ME
PLAY WITH MY BOX, MAIL $6000 DOLLARS TO ME AND THEN WAIT FOR ME AT EASTERN
STATE PENN ON SATURDAY AND I MIGHT SHOW UP.

JOHN EDWARDS:  WHY DO I NEED A BOX I CAN DO IT WITHOUT.....

WILLY:     WHAT WOULD YOU EXPECT TO PAY FOR SOMETHING LIKE THIS $1000.00,
1500, 2000......NO!!!!!!! NOT EVEN CLOSE CALL NOW AND PAY JUST 15 EASY
PAYMENT OF 89.99.......BUT WAIT I AM STILL NOT DONE..... BE ONE OF THE NEXT
50 CALLERS AND I WILL KNOCK 14 PAYMENTS OFF AND EVEN GIVE YOU FREE
SHIPPING.  YOU JUST PAY HANDLING...........BUT WAIT I AM STILL NOT DONE BE
ONE OF THE NEXT 20 CALLERS AND YOU GET A "BEEP IF YOU HATE CHRIS MOON BUMPER
STICKER"  THANKS FOR WATCHING FOLKS!!!!!!!
